attributes.action: not attend the RWC Final in support of England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister is reported to have switched his allegiance from Scotland to England following the Scots defeat and England's win over Australia.  England has reached the final without his support, we don't want the support of a turncoat now!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
